title: can u fking make e girls go in combat when they sheild or throw a fking torndao on somone?
body:
so sick of mobility boots janna runing the map with 520 ms sheilding everyone and throwing cc evrywhere while she still have 520 being uncatchable while also giving them 10% ms towards her and building tanky items so she dosnt get bursted either 
wtf is wrong with this company it's a joke that this stupid shit still happens in s8

replies.body: yeah i wonder why i got 4 downvotes prob e girls didnt like my suggestion

> [{quoted}](name=Purgë,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h19r09ju,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-03-23T00:09:45.702+0000)
>
> yeah i wonder why i got 4 downvotes prob e girls didnt like my suggestion

Or because everything you said is more or less wrong.
He's right about Janna, does her job too well with little punishment available against her.

What's actually funny is someone made the same comment but worded better, got a couple of upvotes (more than 40) and a Rioter even said it was a good idea (Janna losing OOC effects if she shields someone in combat)
Except her q w and r all put her in combat if she hits someone.
landing an attack or ability or receiving damage registers you as being in combat.

> [{quoted}](name=Snapp2Kill,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h19r09ju,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-23T00:14:09.700+0000)
>
> landing an attack or ability or receiving damage registers you as being in combat.

not for janna baby check ur info again

> [{quoted}](name=Purgë,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=h19r09ju,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-03-23T00:37:01.070+0000)
>
> not for janna baby check ur info again

Except it does. It is not coded on a per champion basis.
Idk if you can be more inaccurate...

when i play ap ezreal i always kill janna instead of the carrys, cause fuck janna she will carry the enemy team even if they are braindead with bulll shit heals/shields. same reason i choose to assassinate nami/lulu/sona over a carry.
Idk what tanky Janna's you are playing against, but I can't imagine someone who builds so... poorly, could have any relevance.
"everything you just said is wrong" Luke from starwars

Janna is considered in combat if she hits anyone with her nado for what it's worth. (I also don't think mobi boots are a strong choice on her, as she gets enough movespeed to escape most people from her W, and decent jannas are gonna be actually in combat a lot.)
